extension.menu:
[B][COLOR red]Thor[/COLOR][/B] - Trakt Manager
String.StartsWith(ListItem.path,plugin://plugin.video.thor/) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(isThor_widget),true) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,tvshow) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,season) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,movie)]
[B][COLOR red]Thor[/COLOR][/B] - Rescrape Item
String.StartsWith(ListItem.path,plugin://plugin.video.thor/) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(isThor_widget),true) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,movie)]
[B][COLOR red]Thor[/COLOR][/B] - Clear Providers
String.StartsWith(ListItem.path,plugin://plugin.video.thor/) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(isThor_widget),true) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,movie)]
[B][COLOR red]Thor[/COLOR][/B] - Find Similar
String.StartsWith(ListItem.path,plugin://plugin.video.thor/) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(isThor_widget),true) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,tvshow) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,movie)]
[B][COLOR red]Thor[/COLOR][/B] - Browse Series
String.StartsWith(ListItem.path,plugin://plugin.video.thor/) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(isThor_widget),true) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,tvshow)]
[B][COLOR red]Thor[/COLOR][/B] - Browse Episodes
String.StartsWith(ListItem.path,plugin://plugin.video.thor/) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(isThor_widget),true) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,episode)
-->

extension.summary: Thor - This Addon is currently in beta. Please be aware there may be bugs present
extension.description: Adds Global Contextual Menu Items for Thor menu items throughout Kodi
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007
